summary: Implement a visible in-page Admin Panel login flow and hide dashboard controls until authenticated, removing the blocking 'Access Denied' UI.
architectural_notes: Admin authentication state stored in localStorage key 'isAdmin' as string 'true'.
Admin Panel should conditionally render: show login form when not authenticated; show dashboard controls when authenticated.
On failed password entry, use standard browser alert 'Wrong Password' (no inline error box).
known_issues: Admin Panel currently locked because password input is not visible (blocked by 'Access Denied' UI).

existing_features.title: Remove the red 'Access Denied' message UI from the Admin Panel flow so it no longer blocks access to the password input. Specifically, eliminate the destructive alert box rendered by the current access-denied screen from admin navigation/guards (and remove any references that cause it to render for the Admin Panel unlock flow).

Replace the current modal-based admin password gate with a simple, visible, in-page login form rendered directly inside the Admin Panel page when the admin session is not unlocked (no modals/popups). The form must have: (1) headline text exactly 'Admin Login', (2) a password input (type='password') with placeholder exactly 'Enter Password', and (3) a large green button labeled exactly 'Unlock Dashboard'.

Implement the requested unlock logic for the in-page Admin Panel login form: on clicking 'Unlock Dashboard', validate the password exactly against '@ni#ra&j*gurja:r'. If correct, call localStorage.setItem('isAdmin','true') and refresh the Admin Panel section so the dashboard content becomes visible. If incorrect, show a standard browser alert with text exactly 'Wrong Password' (no extra punctuation).

Hide Admin Panel dashboard controls until successfully unlocked: only render the 'Job Posts', 'Settings', and 'Manage Quiz' buttons/controls after localStorage 'isAdmin' has been set to 'true' (i.e., after successful unlock).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the red 'Access Denied' message box from the Admin Panel UI
Render an in-page (non-modal) Admin Login form when not authenticated (headline, password input, green 'Unlock Dashboard' button)
On 'Unlock Dashboard', validate password; if correct set localStorage isAdmin=true and refresh Admin Panel; if wrong show browser alert 'Wrong Password'
Only show 'Job Posts', 'Settings', and 'Manage Quiz' buttons after successful admin login

projectName: Unblock Admin Panel with in-page password login and hide dashboard controls until unlocked
